isis.stitle: CAB: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WEATHER SEAL

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: A one-piece rubber weather seal is secured to cab door flange with plastic fasteners and provides a weathertight seal around door when door is closed.
Pry off old weather seal at fastener locations. Remove complete seal from cab door flange.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: A one-piece rubber weather seal is secured to cab door flange with plastic fasteners and provides a weathertight seal around the door when door is closed.

step1.para: Be sure all old fasteners have been removed and door flange is free of dirt.
Place new weather seal in place on door flange and align fasteners over mounting holes.
Apply pressure to each fastener to secure weather seal.
